locations: Roam: White stairs to Main Lobby
defense.notes:
Expect a push from Server. Smoke and Jaeger will play by Server while Mute holds White/Garage. Roamers will play above in Square and Open Area to prevent hatches from being opened.

If the push is from Garage, Smoke should rotate to hold Garage while Jaeger plays from Red. Mute will hold White stairs. One roamer should hold Blue while another holds Open Area. 

If the push is from above, roamers should carefully try and get picks on the people opening the hatches. Mute will rotate to White stairs while Smoke rotates to Blue. Jaeger should lock down CCTV to Server and Garage to Lockers.

C4/Smoke are King so Valk, Mute, and Mozzie are good picks.

objective: Roam clear from Square to CCTV Hatch
Roam clear from Square to CCTV Hatch, Breach CCTV Hatch
Push Server to CCTV, Breach CCTV Main Wall
offense.notes:
While three push Server to CCTV and open the Main Wall, Doki and Hibana should push Square to CCTV Hatch and open it. Once the hatch is opened, one can hold above while another pushes down white. 

Ace and Capitao should open the CCTV wall into Server while Iana rotates to push White.

If we can get main hatch (above CCTV site) we should be able to plant default (server door into cctv) and close the round.

objective: Push Garage into Lockers or CCTV
Push Garage, open Garage Main wall
Push Square down to CCTV Hatch
Push Square down to CCTV Hatch
offense.notes:
IQ, Ace, and Ash will push Garage and get Garage wall while Kali and Hibana roam clear and get CCTV Hatch.

Once the hatch and wall are open, Garage pushers should push into CCTV or Lockers and attempt to plant while Hibana and Kali deny rotations.

locations: Roam: White stairs to Blue stairs
defense.notes: Castle will seal off site and Mute will deny main walls. Both will play in site. Jaeger will deny utility and roam to deny hard beach. Valk and Mozzie will provide Intel and roam to deny above and hard breach. Play smart, get picks. We have a really good hold here. Valk will play in the basement to help out with White stairs and can flank bottom of Square.

objective: Push Open Area, Breach Main wall
offense.notes:
We should never have to go here on offense, but if we do let’s get control of Open Area and get that Main Wall. Sledge and Zofia will roam clear above, then Sledge will apply top-down pressure from Executive. Once the wall is open, Ying can blind the anchors and get a plant down. No true default plant other than near bomb chassis in Archives.

After the Ying-plant, Sledge and Zof will cut off rotates by flanking down Main/White stairs and supporting the hard breach team.

defense.notes: Mute will deny the two main walls and Supply and Executive Lounge. He'll anchor by Front Office/Banana. Castle will deny entry and soak utility with his barricades. Wamai will play in CEO, supporting Castle in case of Stock pushes. Doc and Valk will roam, with Doc possibly spawn peeking.

objective: Push Server up to White stairs
Push Server up to White stairs
offense.notes:
IQ can help Kali, Hibana, and Ace get the Main walls into CEO Office. While Kali, Hibana, and Ace get the wall, IQ and Ash should enter from Server and roam clear bottom-up, flanking up White stairs. Their job is to roam clear.

Once the wall is open and roam clear complete, aggressively take CEO. Someone should play in Executive while the plant is going down with another in 2F Supply. Postplant, just hold CEO.

objective: Breach Open Area hatches, Push Open Area

defense.notes:
Mute will use two jammers on Main wall, one on Metal stairs, and one on Office door into Fountain. He'll hold behind metal half wall in Armory. Mozzie will hold behind other half wall in Armory. Jager will hold in Archives. Valk and Doc will roam.

One really strong tactic is the double-bulletproof camera strat: one on half wall in Armory facing Main wall, the other on metal half wall facing Archives Balcony.

offense.notes: This attack relies on a back way push with pressure onto front way. Mav and Twitch will clear out CCTV and either breach Armory wall, or support the post plant (depending on how effective the back push is.) The back push consists of IQ and Capitao pushing Armory Balcony very aggressively and smoke planting. Amaru can support their push or be aggressive with a sandwhich push.

defense.notes:
This hold works really well against a top down approach provided that the roamers play above and waste lots of time. As the clock ticks, the anchors should start locking down site more and more. 

In the case that the roamers get picked and the attackers take a top-down approach, the anchors should leave site semi-open and take positions to hold the stairs and prepare for a retake.

In the case of a Bathroom push, one roamer should flank down Main Lobby stairs while either Mute or Mozzie prepare to throw a nitro into Bathroom as soon as it is opened.

In the case of a Vent push, someone should support whoever is holding in Vent while the roamers flank.

offense.notes: Clear top floor and see what picks we can get. Ideally, get a hatch if we’re pushing from bathroom. Default is either right next to hard breach for workshop OR window in vent.

defense.notes:
Mute and Mozzie will deny intel. Mute will hold in Supply room while Mozzie holds in Customs. Jager will hold in between. Valk and Doc will roam. Barricade Metal stairs door to Custom and reinforce the walls behind it. Make a rotate between Supply and Customs.

Watch out for rushes/smoke plants into Supply or the office-area of Customs.

objective: Breach Main Wall, Push Supply Room
offense.notes: Get Mav to trick the Main Wall while others get CCTV control. If all else fails, ideally plant in the main window for Supply.

objective: Breach Main Wall, Push into Tellers

defense.notes:
Mute and Mozzie will deny intel heavily. Valk will provide it. Mozzie will hold in Dining while Jager holds Trophy. Mute will play in the Kitchen hall and can support either. Doc will roam above, Valk below. 

In case of a Main Lobby push, Valk can support from Blue or Main while Doc supports from above. Mute can rotate to Dining to support Mozzie.

In case of a top-down take, Valk and Doc will attack Master while Mute holds Front stairs.

offense.notes:
While Capitao, Amaru, and Twitch clear Master and get top-down pressure, Maverick and Buck will destroy the floor from below. Once soft destruction has been applied, Buck and Mav can rotate to Dining through Main stairs or Blue stairs. Amaru can rush Trophy through the window. Once we have Trophy control and Kitchen control, plant.

Default plant is right in the window, or if we’re memeing the Cam spot.

defense.notes:
Mute will deny the Main wall with a jammer and jam the Main stairs, and Blue hall. He'll pocket one for use in Mute tricking. Mozzie can deny where he feels fits. Jager has to deny utility clear from the drone hole. Valk and Doc will roam.

In case of a Main wall push, Valk should attempt a Nitro throw. Doc should rotate near site to contest angles through the open wall (if it gets opened). Mute will play in Blue. 

In case of a Wine Cellar push, Jager should support Mozzie while Mute takes his place. Doc or Valk can flank.

In case of a top-down take, Doc and Valk should rotate to take out the roamers. Mute will rotate to hold Blue.

objective: Breach Main Wall, Push into Snowmobile Garage
Breach Main wall, Breach Wine Cellar
Roam clear or Push Wine cellar
Roam clear or Push Wine cellar
offense.notes: Have Mav trick the main wall or support Thermite opening it. Someone please watch main runout from the left (Games door). Twitch will support. After the wall is open, Mav and Twitch will apply pressure onto Snowmobile Garage while Thermite rotates to support a back push into Wine Cellar. Amaru and Zofia will either roam clear, or go straight to a back push. Default plant is right behind the green trash cans (by drone hole).

objective: Support Mav trick, Push into Garage
offense.notes: Mav will open the Main wall with Zof's support. While this is happening, Capitao, Ash, and Dokkaebi will push back way and attempt to surprise plant.

defense.notes:
Mozzie will focus on solely denying/gathering intel with Valk's support. Rook, Jager, and Mozzie will hold down site. Doc and Valk will roam and hold Library and below.

As cheeky as it is, spawn peeks can be helpful as long as we don't get too aggressive. 

Early picks are good. Watch bathroom/balcony rushes.

objective: Push Main Lobby balcony, Support entry fraggers
offense.notes:
Iana will pressure Office from the Master Balcony while Kali holds the angle into Office from afar. Amaru will rush Bathroom coordinated with Twitch and IQ pushing Master Balcony. Once Office is clear and Master is clear, plant, and deny site retake. 

Rappel and holding angles is good but don’t waste too much time doing it. Default plant is behind bed or couch depending on the situation or what they reinforced.

objective: Push into Library, Breach Games hatch

defense.notes: Mute will deny Main Wall and use his jammers on Red and Cash wall, then hold in site. Lesion will litter gu mines on Red and Garage and anchor there. Mozzie will Anchor in Garage, but can roam. Valk roams upstairs while Jaeger roams downstairs.

Mute will deny Main wall, Red, and Construction while pocketing a jammer for Main wall. Wamai or Lesion will hold on Red, with the other Holding in Garage (shield goes in Garage). They can rotate to support each other. Mute will hold down site. Valk and Doc will roam and support anchors as needed. 

In case of a Main wall push, Garage anchor needs to rotate back to site and get in Red or Cash. A roamer should go to Garage. 

In case of a Garage push, Red anchor should support Garage while a roamer moves to Garage to support. 

In case of a Construction push, Garage anchor should support in Cash while a roamer cuts of rotates to Master.

objective: Push from Gym to Bar or Red
offense.notes: Mav will trick CCTV Main Wall while Doki and Zof push into Logistics and Amaru pushes into Gym. Ash supports Mav. Logistics people and Amaru pinch roamers in Master. Then, Amaru pushes down to Bar then up Red while Doki and Zof push to Cash. At this point, the wall should be open. Ash can push into Garage while Mav holds CCTV or she can push with him into CCTV. When CCTV is controlled and we have rotates from Red and Cash blocked, plant. Postplant, Doki will watch CCTV window, Ash and Mav watch from outside, Zofia watches Cash and Amaru watches Red.

IQ will help Kali and Ace open the Main wall. In the meantime, Twitch and Amaru will roam clear. Once the wall is opened, Kali will support from afar while IQ rotates to Garage or Red and Ace takes CCTV control. The roam clearers should have pushed to Cash by this time, so the squad can execute a pinch and plant.

For this push to work, it has to be aggressive and fast. Kali and Thermite will open the Main wall while Ying and Monty bully their way through Garage. Capitao will take an agressive hold from CCTV window or the opened wall. Once the wall is opened and Ying/Monty are in CCTV, Ying/smoke plant with Monty protecting defuse and Capitao firebolting off Cash and Red. Postplant, Monty will stand on defuse while the team protects him.

defense.notes: Mute will hold top of Main stairs and attempt to deny Main wall. Mozzie and Castle with anchor in Gym/Master. Valk will roam upstairs while Jaeger roams downstairs. Watch logistics takes (roof hatch). Someone should hold garage, then fall back to CCTV, than to Cash (waste time).

offense.notes: Amaru will rush to Logistics and get control while Mav gets the Main wall and Doki and Ash roam clear. Once the wall is open and Doki and Ash have control of Construction, then coordinate a push: Zof and Mav will go to Gym for plant while Amaru, Ash, and Doki take Master. After plant, Amaru can watch Main stairs, Ash can watch Construction, Doki stays in Master or watches CCTV window, Mav and Zof maintain Gym control. Default plant in Gym by window or water fountain.

defense.notes: Reinforce both main hatches (Kitchen/Moto), both main Church walls and Blue wall to Armory. This site requires all 10 reinforcements, and Castle, Mute, and Kaid to safely turtle. Electro claw Church wall to Blue and Kitchen hatch. Mute off Armory wall to Blue and Church wall to Main stairs. Mozzie off Main stairs and Dirt. Castle off dirt. Hold this site like Nature/Bush. Everyone anchor and play smart (except Alex, who will just roam as Psycho Valk or be a smart Valk and flank the Blue push). This is a great anchor site. Be alert to Nitro Kitchen hatch, using the Valk cam for intel. There should also be a cam in Blue.

objective: Breach Dirt wall, Breach Kitchen Hatch
Push Gym, Roam clear, Push Main stairs
Push Gym, Roam clear, Push Main stairs
offense.notes: CLEAR OUT ROAMERS FIRST! Amaru and Zofia will push into Gym and roam clear. Thermite will hard breach dirt and kitchen hatch while Mav and Twitch push down into Blue. When roam clear is done, Amaru and Zof will push down Main stairs. Mav can open into Armory or Church for extra pressure if needed, or just have him and Twitch pinch with Amaru and Zof while Therm holds Kitchen hatch.. (Optional but helpful: hard breach church wall by main stairs and moto hatch (bar hatch)). Default is armory corner, but anywhere in armory that we have control of is good, as well as behind Black Box in Church.

defense.notes: Someone play Cool Vibes, someone get behind Hookah bar, and someone play in Billiards. Two others roam. Hookah floor is soft so Cool Vibes guy should be aware and ready to rotate to sunrise if need be. Pulse is good to sit in sunrise or anyone with info/nitro.

objective: Support on rappel or from roof, Push Aqua or Hookah
offense.notes: Hibana/Ace the Billiards Main Wall from roof. Plant default (near hookah window).

defense.notes: Shield rushes are important to counter. To counter, play Maestro/Smoke to stop plants in service doorway. Two roamers on top floor or by stairs for flanks.

offense.notes: Get top-down. Don’t get too focused on long angles. Default is by kitchen window or service door.

defense.notes: Jäger is very important. Hard breach denial is nice, but not required. A shield counter is good like Lesion/Smoke.

objective: Breach Bathroom hatch, Push Bathroom or Main Window
offense.notes: Get roof hatch. Have someone enter Hookah balcony and pressure Penthouse. Plant default by window.

defense.notes:
Mute will deny all three stairs and the Consul wall to Yellow. Mozzie will use his spiders to deny additional droning from Bathroom, Admin, and Meeting. Mute will hold in Meeting, Mozzie in Consul.

Jager will hold in Yellow. Valk will roam below, and Doc will roam by Admin or Visa.

Communication is really important for this site, so the anchors should be letting the roamers know where the push is coming from, and where attackers are rappelled. 

In the case they push Yellow and Consul windows, Doc should rotate to Waiting to contest windows while Valk rotates towards bottom Yellow for runouts. Mute will support Jager on Yellow.

In the case they push Visa, Mute will hold Visa stairs. Jager should remain on Yellow, with Doc moving to Waiting to support on Visa or Spiral stairs.

In the case they push Admin, Mute will hold Meeting with Doc contesting in Admin. Mozzie should move to Waiting to prove support. Valk can rotate back to Consul.

offense.notes:
Maverick will clear Anchors from Consul alcove while IQ and Capitao apply Consul pressure from rappel. Twitch and Amaru will enter from Admin (or somewhere else) and roam clear the second floor. 

Once the second floor is clear, Mav will push up Yellow while IQ and Capitao take Consul and smoke plant, denying Consul door and a rotate with a smoke/fire bolt. Mav will hold yellow while Amaru and Twitch deny rotates from Meeting or Waiting.

WATCH RUNOUTS! Default is behind desk (on top of if they have a pulse underneath). Admin Office (Visa stairs) and Yellow push simultaneously.

defense.notes:
Mute and Mozzie will deny intel. Mute will use a jammer on Spiral and Visa stairs and Cafeteria. He'll pocket one for hard breach denial support. Kaid will deny Main wall. Mozzie and Kaid will hold in Garage. Mute will hold in Cafeteria with a shallow roam by Servers. Jager can play in Garage or roam above by Piano. Valk will roam above.

In the case of a Garage and Yellow push, Jager should play in Garage to support Mozzie and Kaid. Mute will rotate to prevent flanks from Spiral. Valk can rotate to Piano to provide support. 

In case of a back push, Mute will play back by Servers to try and deny stairs. Jager can play in Cafeteria while Valk rotates to cut off Spiral. 

In case of a Piano take, Mute will hold Spiral while Jager and Kaid hold Yellow. Mozzie should watch Visa, Valk should rotate to Piano.

objective: Breach Main Wall, Push White Van
offense.notes: Mav will open the Main wall with the support of Doki and Zof. While the wall is being opened, Amaru and Twitch should roam clear from top down. When the wall is open, coordinate a push into Garage with a push into Cafeteria. When Mav, Doki, and Zof have Garage control, one of them should hold Yellow while another denies long hall. Amaru and Twitch can play by Visa or in Cafeteria. At this point, the plant can go down. Default is by White van.

defense.notes:
Mute will open above main door to prevent default plant. He will jam Piano to Yellow, Spiral to Lobby, Visa hall, and other. Mozzie will deny intel from Main door. Mute will play in Connector, supporting as needed, Mozzie in Bathroom or Lobby. Jager can play in Piano. Valk will roam above with Doc, rotating as needed.

Piano players should let 2nd floor roamer know if Yellow Stairs pressure is coming.

In the case of a Piano push, Valk should rotate down Yellow while Doc rotates down Spiral, Mute will support Jager in Piano. Mozzie will stay in Lobby.

In the case of a Main door push, Doc or Valk should play above through the shotgun hole. Mute will support from Connector. 

In the case of a top-down take, Mozzie should remain hidden in Bathroom and attempt to provide intel. Jager will hold Piano while Mute holds Connector/Lobby. Doc and Valk should rotate to alleviate pressure. Mute can rotate to Visa stairs to deny a flank.

offense.notes: Amaru and IQ should get 2nd floor control and clear out utility and roamers. Zof should apply pressure Main door while Iana and Twitch get Piano control. Once in Piano, they should coordinate with Zof to take over Bathroom and Lobby. At this point, the roam clear group can come down Spiral or Visa to provide support for the plant. Watch runouts.

defense.notes: Mute will deny both stairs, Heaven, and Cigar. He'll hold White. Wamai will play in Heaven with Doc in Christmas and Mozzie by top-Red or Freezer. Valk will roam. Don’t make stupid peeks on hatches/skylight. Get early picks and watch out for multiple drops from hatches.

offense.notes: Mav, Thermite and Capitao will take Christmas and open the Freezer wall. Once Freezer wall is open, roam clearers should converge up White and into Cigar while breach team pushes into Bar to get the plant down. There should be a flank cam on Red and White. Default plant is behind the small bar next to new hatch.

defense.notes:
Mute, Mozzie, and Castle will lock down site while Valkyrie and Jager roam. 

In case of a Bakery push, two anchors will play close to Bakery while the roamers cut off rotates from Red. 

In case of a Freezer push, the roamers should flank from White and Pillar as two anchors play close to Freezer. White control is essential to halt the Freezer push. Jäger can hangout by Pillars/1F Bar to assist roamer flanking from White. Someone can have Bakery control to halt that push and hold a long angle to Pillar if the White push is overwhelming.

objective: Push White stairs or Christmas down to Pillar
Push White stairs or Christmas down to Pillar
offense.notes: Half the team should clear Bakery and get Bakery control while the other two roam clear and get Pillar/White control. Bakery team will open wall. Simultaneously push site. Default plant is behind the half-wall next to Freezer or other half-wall in Kitchen Cooking.

objective: Push above Baker into Trains and remove HBD.
Push in from White and clear roamers
offense.notes: IQ should push through White with the entry fraggers and roam clear 2nd floor. While the entry fraggers push third floor to roam clear, IQ will remove utility from Bakery Main wall. Thermite and Zofia will push Bakery and once the utility is gone, open Main wall. When the wall is opened and roamers are cleared out, Zof and Therm should apply pressure from Bakery while IQ holds from above. The entry fraggers will come back to site and swap to Bakery so Thermite and Zof can get freezer wall.

defense.notes:
Mute and Mozzie will heavily deny intel and combo hold Reading/White. Wamai will play in Dining. Valk and Doc will roam.

In case of a top down push, Wamai should rotate to hold Red while the roamers push top. Mute will play on White.

In case of a White push, Mute and a roamer should combo hold White. The same goes true for a Red push with Wamai.

Be careful of rushes and make smart plays. We’ll win if we press our advantages. It’s okay to give up ground to continue to stall.

objective: Push Christmas and get top-down control
Push White up to Reading or Christmas down to Reading
Push White up to Reading or Christmas down to Reading
offense.notes:
Mav, Doki, and Zof will clear top down from Christmas while the other two roam clear. The Trains hatch should be opened and coordinated with a Mining push from Red. 

If we have Mining control, either clear out Dining and plant there or if Dining is clear, plant in Dining while clearing Reading. Default in reading is anywhere near cover, default in Dining is next to window. By the time we get the plant down just hold the room until we secure the win.

objective: Breach Christmas hatch, get top-down control

defense.notes:
Mute will jam the main walls and both Red and Green stairs. Mozzie can pest where he feels is best. Valk and Doc will roam as necessary. Jager will hold in Servers/Radar, Mozzie will hold in Bridge/Printers, and Mute will hold in Radar/Main wall. 

In case of a Main wall push, one roamer should rotate back to site to stop the push.

In case of a Yellow push, Jager should help Mozzie hold Bridge while a roamer flanks Yellow.

In case of a Green or Red push, the roamers should flank while Mozzie reinforces whoever is under pressure.

It’s welcome but not needed to bring extra denial. Watch windows and have a deployable shield if holding Bridge. Hold top of Yellow/Printer. Bring an intel operator and place a camera of some kind in Green 90 so we can watch top Red/top Green pushes as well as window rushes.

objective: Breach Main Wall, Push Radar Room
Push Main wall, Support Mav trick
offense.notes: Maverick and Zofia will open the Main wall while Amaru and IQ push from Bridge and Jackal clears roamers. When the wall is open, Mav and Zof should hold until they're ready to push into Radar with the Bridge pushers. Jackal can flank up Red and deny rotates from security while the plant is going down.

defense.notes: Any extra intel is appreciated, especially for bottom of Yellow stairs and the Main entrance by Bathroom.

objective: Push top-down, Breach Coast Guard hatch, Push down White or Yellow
offense.notes: Get to the roof and push from top Yellow and White. Play smart angles and if you’re by yourself you’re doing it wrong.

defense.notes: If we’re up 2-0 on a team we can play a lil crazy so have fun but someone stay on site with Cam.

objective: Push Radar, Breach Bridge hatch, Push down Green or Red
offense.notes: We shouldn’t see this site but if we do we’ll go top down, get Red and Green stairs control, get a hatch or 2, and we should win the round.

defense.notes:
Mute will deny the stairs and Connector/Everetts walls. Smoke will place his shield into Trophy where Mute will hold. Smoke will hold in Kids dorms denying entry from Main window. Wamai will hold Connector. Castle will roam by Armory/Small Tower while Valk roams by Big Tower.

In case of a Connector push, Castle should rotate to support Valk while Mute rotates to support Wamai.

In case of a Armory/Games push, Wamai should rotate to support Mute while Valk rotates to support Castle.

In case of a Main window push, Mute will support Smoke while Castle roams to Small Tower.

objective: Breach Connector Wall, Push Connector or Main Window
offense.notes:
Maverick and Zofia will clear out Big Tower and then push Connector wall while Thermite and Twitch open Games wall and push Games. Meanwhile, Amaru will apply pressure to Main window, and maybe clear out Small Tower. 

When the team is ready, the two hard breach teams should coordinate a pinch into Games while Amaru denies rotates. Once Games is controlled, the team can take site and plant.

defense.notes:
Mute will deny Main stairs, Blue Bunker, and Freezer wall. He'll pocket one for use on Main wall. He'll hold by Laundry or Main stairs. Smoke will reinforce half the Main wall and setup his shield in Blue. He can play in Blue and deny the push, then fall back and reinforce the other half of the wall if they push too hard. Wamai will setup by Pillar and hold Pillar. Valkyrie will roam above while Castle does a shallow roam by Freezer.

This strat expects a Blue push. 

In case of a Freezer push, Valk should rotate to support Castle while Smoke rotates/reinforces out of Blue to fall back into Supply.

In case of a Main or Big Tower push, Smoke should also rotate/reinforce out and support either Mute or Wamai.

objective: Push Blue Bunker with Thermite, get Main Wall open. Support frag or plant.
Push Blue Bunker, Breach Main wall
Push Blue Bunker to Pillar, or from Freezer
offense.notes:
Maverick, Thermite, and Ash will push Blue Bunker and open the Main wall. At the same time, Twitch and Zofia will roam clear down to Freezer or down Big Tower stairs. 

Once the Main wall is open and the roam clear team is in Freezer, take Pillar. Once Pillar is controlled, take Supply roam and plant.

defense.notes:
Mute, Wamai, and Castle will lock down site, expecting a push from Small Tower. Valk and Vigil will roam and pick off as many attackers as they can. 

In case of a top-down push, roamers should converge on the attackers.

objective: Push Big Tower, Roam clear, Push to Kitchen
Push Small Tower, Breach Dining wall, Push Dining
Push Big Tower, Roam clear, Push to Kitchen
offense.notes: Iana and Ash will roam clear from Big Tower, through Meeting, up Armory, down White, to Kitchen. Meanwhile, Thermite, Kali, and Zofia will push Small Tower and open the Dining wall. When the roam clear is complete, Iana and Ash will pinch with the Small Tower people into Dining.

objective: Push Connector, Breach Meeting Room Main Wall, Breach Kitchen Main Wall
Support on rappel or from roof, Push Aqua or Hookah
Push Garage into Store or Push into Kitchen
Support on rappel or from roof, Push Aqua or Hookah
Push Study or up Red stairs
offense.notes: Zofia and IQ will roam clear from Master to Aviator while Maverick and Jackal clear from Main stairs to 90, possibly up Red or Main. Ash will enter as fit and entry frag. When roamers are cleared, pinch site heavily, with a Mav trick into Vault if needed.

objective: Push Master to Astro or Study to Trophy

defense.notes:
Mute, Wamai, and Castle will lock down site while Vigil and Valkyrie roam and pick off attackers. The roamers' goal should be to waste time. 

In case of a Tarps push, one roamer should flank down Red.

In case of an Astro push, one roamer should flank down Astro.

In case of a Basement push, the Anchors should hold in Kitchen while a roamer flanks from Astro stairs. 

Remember to leave the wall between Kitchen Entrance and Dining soft.

objective: Push Main stairs through Living Room
Push Study to Master, down Astro
Push Study to Master, down Astro
offense.notes: Maverick and Jackal will roam clear first floor while IQ and Zofia roam clear second floor. Ash will entry frag. When roamers are cleared, take Kitchen control and flank from Tarps (Monument room) through Dining.

objective: Push Tarps to Living Room or Main Entrance to Library
